title: HKU個研究生會黎緊15/8有個General Meeting

replies.msg:
[PGSA] Notice of General Meeting

Dear students,

We are sorry for the cancellation of the AGM on 14 July. To receive and adopt the Annual Report and to address concerns from our members, a General Meeting is hereby convened to be held in next week.
All current postgraduate students of HKU are either Full or Associate Members of PGSA that are eligible to attend the General Meeting. Thus, we invite you to attend the General Meeting to exercise your right as a member. Please find the attached Agenda of the General Meeting.

Date: 15 August 2019 (Thursday)
Time: 14:00 -17:00
Venue: CPD 3.04, Run Run Shaw Tower
Agenda: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bVu1AmaIhwaVBzLCVRDyED9xRCu8mfGj/view?usp=sharing

Sincerely

ZHANG Zhening
President, Postgraduate Student Association
THE UNIVERSITY OF HONG KONG
P407, Graduate House, No.3 University Drive
pgsa@hku.hk | www.pgsa.hku.hk




有無HKU pg巴打絲打個咩事？
